nodes.text: This sewer system was a collection of sewers underneath Gorse City on the planet Gorse. By 11 BBY groundquakes on Gorse had rendered the sewers useless, and only certain beings like Skelly even knew that they existed. Skelly used the sewers to gain entry to the Moonglow Polychemical refinery in a misguided attempt to speak to Count Denetrius Vidian, and escaped the facility that way after being severely beaten by the cyborg aristocrat.
